name: Splashy Sub - Underwater Game
description:
Splashy Sub is a fun game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Navigate your submarine through sea waters. Avoid obstacles by moving your submarine up and down. Try it, and see how high you can score. Challenge your friends to beat your score.

Features:
- fun addictive gameplay
- simple and intuitive controls
- beautiful Retina display graphics
- Game Center integration
- Universal (works on all devices)

Enjoy the game!
